trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Expõe <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> tipos a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado este ponto de automatização.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controlo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controlo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Se um dos seguintes casos ocorrer, este método devolve um objeto que suporte o padrão de controlo especificado.

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>que está associado este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>podem ser verificadas.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> cannot be checked.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>que está associado este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>não pode ser verificada.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que suporte o padrão de controlo se patternInterface é um valor suportado; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Envia um pedido para ativar o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> não está ativada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> can be checked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> podem ser verificadas.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System%23Windows%23Automation%23Provider%23IToggleProvider%23Toggle%2A> instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer.System%23Windows%23Automation%23Provider%23IToggleProvider%23Toggle%2A> em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the checked states of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Percorre os Estados de marcada a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> não está ativada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> cannot be checked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> não pode ser verificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado verificado do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser utilizado apenas quando o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>instância é convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IToggleProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The checked state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado verificado do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton"> </xref> que está associado este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonSplitButtonAutomationPeer"> </xref>.
